Text: ERCOT Scheduling Cc PST Attached are two documents that outline day ahead scheduling procedures for the weekend The first walks you through copying schedules if Saturday and Sunday are the same The second is the normal procedure used to submit schedules using QSE MOS Questions should be directed to Smith or Bill Freije bc I am leaving for Austin tomorrow Good luck Original Message From Day Smith L Sent Thursday August AM To Katz Randy Subject Smith L Day Enron Power Marketing Inc Ph Fax Pager
